metadata.dcterms:title: Data for: "An Efficient and Accurate Numerical Determination of the Cluster Resolution Metric"
metadata.dcterms:creator: Armstrong, Michael
Paulina de la Mata
metadata.dcterms:description: Dataset containing peak table information for a study discriminating between the odiferous profiles of cotton and polyester fabrics. Collected on a Comprehensive 2-Dimensional Gas Chromatography - Time-of-Flight Mass Spectrometry (GCxGC-TOFMS) instrument. Used in the paper: "An Efficient and Accurate Numerical Determination of the Cluster Resolution Metric", for testing new data analysis strategies.
metadata.dcterms:subject: Chemistry
metadata.dcterms:isReferencedBy: de la Mata, A. Paulina, et al. "Comprehensive two-dimensional gas chromatographic profiling and chemometric interpretation of the volatile profiles of sweat in knit fabrics." Analytical and bioanalytical chemistry 409.7 (2017): 1905-1913., doi, 10.1007/s00216-016-0137-1
